javavis.jip2d.functions
Class LearnLT

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.Function2D
      javavis.jip2d.functions.LearnLT
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LearnLT
extends Function2D

Learning process in the License Template application. It creates a file with the histograms of the input image.
It applies to bitmap images.

Input parameters:

  • img: The input image. It has to be a bitmap image.
  • fileName: The file name which contains the data.
  • string: String value which contains the characters in the image.

Image result:
  • A processed image and a file with the histogram data of the input image.

See Also:
Serialized Form
